visual.name: ForecastUsingNeuralNetworkByMAQSoftware
visual.displayName: Forecast using Neural Network by MAQ Software
visual.description: Uses neural network algorithm to forecast future values based on historical data.

parameterSettings.description: Set the parameters for the forecasting model

units.description: Number of units up to which next values would be predicted

decay.description: Decay in weights after each iteration, so that weights don't grow extremely large after successive computations

maxitr.description: Maximum number of iterations to train the neural network in a defined duration called as epoch

epochs.description: Duration having defined number of iterations for training the network

size.description: Defines number of calculation performed to achieve output equation for the model in each iteration

confInterval.description: Turn confidence intervals true or false

xAxisBaseLineCol.description: Color of x axis base line

xAxisBaseLineWidth.description: Width of x axis base line
